summary: VFNO (Voluptuous Female Npc Overhaul) This mod gives all vanilla female npc a more voluptuous bodyshape. This is an edit of VadersApp Realistic Body System.
descriptionHtml:
Voluptuous Female Npc Overhaul

[IMG]http://i1265.photobucket.com/albums/jj518/Gilbert5866/Skyrim%20VFNO/e76f7306-6c0a-4ae1-9e64-d7daf8e55a64_zps9a500837.jpg[/IMG]
====================================================================================================================
Description

WORK IN PROGRESS (Month or more)

This mod will take me a while to complete I just wanted to show of a little preview, basically I am editing every female npc in vanilla skyrim and giving them a more voluptous body shape as well as adding new cloths accessories and more! This is also a modded version of Realistic Body System without the problems hopefully.

IF YOU DONT LIKE THICK, HUGE BREASTS, LARGE BREASTS, SLUTY NPC, BIG ASSES THIS MOD IS NOT FOR YOU PLZ NO TROLLING!!!

- 21 Different female bodytypes so far. (Most followers have huge breasts and big asses others a bit less)
- Bodies incorporated: Tbbp, Bbbp, Chsbhc, Manga, DM. Ebbp...

Where I got my inspiration.

====================================================================================================================
Progress

Argonians: Complete
Altmer (High Elves): Semi Finished
Bosmer (Wood Elves):
Breton: Semi Finished
Redguard: Not Started
Orc:  Not Started
Nord: Not Started
Dunmer (Dark Elves): Semi Finished
Imperial: Not Started
Khajiit: Not Started
